final_state.name: Alice
memory: You're Alice, the detective.
You know Bob is the mafioso.
Diana was found dead this morning.
You said: I'm suspicious of Bob's sudden absence last night. Let's keep a close eye on him.
Bob: I was up late working on a project, that's why you didn't see me during the discussion round last night. Nothing to worry about.
Charlie: I agree with Alice, we should keep an eye on Bob. It's unusual for him to be absent during the discussion round.
You said: Let's stay vigilant. Bob's absence during the last discussion round is concerning. We should keep a close eye on him.
Bob: I was up late working on a project and apologize for missing the discussion round last night. Nothing to worry about, just focused on my work.
Charlie: Let's not jump to conclusions about Bob. He mentioned his project kept him up late. We should give him the benefit of the doubt.
